params.prover: The address of the successful prover

InitialVerificationSuccessful(address,ui.details: Note that the prover must wait until `n` blocks have been mined subsequent to the generation of this event before the 2nd tx can be sent

params.blockNumber: The blocknumber in which the initial validation succeeded
params.prover: The address of the calling prover

params.commitment: contains the full commitment that was used for the commitmentHash
params.id: an identifying value generated in the previous transaction
params.validatorProof: a struct containing the data needed to verify all validator signatures

params._mmrVerification: The contract to be used for MMR verification
params._validatorRegistry: The contract to be used as the validator registry

params.commitmentHash: contains the commitmentHash signed by the validator(s)
params.validatorClaimsBitfield: a bitfield containing a membership status of each validator who has claimed to have signed the commitmentHash
params.validatorPosition: the position of the validator, index starting at 0
params.validatorPublicKey: the public key of the validator
params.validatorPublicKeyMerkleProof: proof required for validation of the public key in the validator merkle tree

params.beefyMMRLeaf: contains the merkle leaf to be verified

devdoc.title: A entry contract for the Ethereum light client

FinalVerificationSuccessful(address,uint.notice: Notifies an observer that the complete verification process has  finished successfuly and the new commitmentHash will be accepted

InitialVerificationSuccessful(address,ui.notice: Notifies an observer that the prover's attempt at initital verification was successful.

completeSignatureCommitment(uint256,(uin.notice: Performs the second step in the validation logic

newSignatureCommitment(bytes32,uint256[].notice: Executed by the prover in order to begin the process of block acceptance by the light client

verifyBeefyMerkleLeaf(bytes32,(bytes32[].notice: Executed by the incoming channel in order to verify commitment
